summary: This document is a summary of account transactions for a business checking account held at Deutsche Bank from August 1, 2015, to August 31, 2015. It details the account balance, deposits, withdrawals, and checks paid during this period, highlighting the financial activities associated with the account.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $220,921.16 on August 1, 2015.
The ending balance as of August 31, 2015, was $188,175.21.
Multiple checks were issued during the month, with the largest being for $11,179.00.
There were no overdraft or NSF fees charged during this statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
